mapper.select: SELECT A.EVAL_ID , A.EVAL_TTL , A.CENT_ID , A.MEM_ID , A.WRI_ID , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT FROM TB_EVALUATION A WHERE A.CENT_ID = #{id} AND A.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{pageable.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageable.pageSize} ROWS ONLY;

SELECT A.CENT_ID , A.CENT_NAME , A.CENT_ADR , A.CENT_PHO , A.CENT_MEM_CNT , A.CENT_OPR_AT , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT , A.DELETED_AT , A.ACTIVE FROM TB_CENTER A WHERE A.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{pageable.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageable.pageSize} ROWS ONLY;

SELECT A.EVAL_ID , A.EVAL_TTL , A.CENT_ID , A.MEM_ID , A.WRI_ID , A.CREATED_AT , A.UPDATED_AT FROM TB_EVALUATION A WHERE A.ACTIVE = TRUE ORDER BY A.CREATED_AT DESC OFFSET #{pageable.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageable.pageSize} ROWS ONLY;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_CENTER A WHERE A.ACTIVE = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM TB_CENTER A WHERE A.ACTIVE = TRUE;
